!Nun of the silence Of [eris]: Now you converse for the sake of the part of my soul, which I concluded before the cell Of [nastoyatelnitsy]. It is possible to say that you talk for the sake of my specter. Believe, I remember all events, which occurred with me to death. But now I would want to hear the reason, at the point of which you arrived here.
